name: EUROPEAN MUSLIMS LEAGUE
goal:
The European Muslims League, is an organization composed by europeans, founded on 10 may 2010 and registered before the Italian Government, Ministry of Finance, with the aim of making known Islam, in its original form, religion of peace and respect for all the humanity.
Our intent is to build bridges of friendship between Christians and Muslims in Europe and worldwide, avoiding clashes and attacks. Encouraging meetings, debates, discussions, in order to make ourselves known to each other and continue on a path of peace, respect and harmony despite the differences.

We are willing to participate all over Europe in the Conferences on religions matters and to invite to our meetings, those whom promote interfaith dialogue and make every effort to support peace and harmony in our beloved Europe.
interests: Communication, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: We are interested in following social affairs and human rights.
